title: Initial D: The Fool, with a Dog Face and Wearing Winged Headgear, Menacing Christ; bas-de-page A Fool Making Face at the Reader
description: Initial D: The Fool, with a Dog Face and Wearing Winged Headgear, Menacing Christ; bas-de-page A Fool Making Face at the Reader; Bute Master (Franco-Flemish, active about 1260 - 1290); Northeastern (illuminated), France; text and illumination about 1285; Tempera colors, gold, and iron gall ink on parchment; Leaf: 17 × 11.9 cm (6 11/16 × 4 11/16 in.); Ms. 46, fol. 72; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
